text: Nicki Minaj is not surprised about the rumors that Drake has a child from a previous fling with an adult film star due to his ‘ playboy ’ stereotype and in fact, she thinks there may be other baby mamas out there trying to get some money! Nicki Minaj, 35, is not entirely shocked to hear about the rumors that Drake, 31, may have a secret son with porn star Sophie Brussaux and even thinks it ’ s possible he could have other children out there. “ Nicki ’ s not surprised by these rumors, ” a source close to Nicki EXCLUSIVELY told HollywoodLife. “ Not at all.
